api.CSSStyleSheet.deleteRule.comment: Works reliably, but changes are not always reflected in web dev tools

api.DOMMatrixReadOnly.transformPoint.comment: Works but isn't documented on MDN (despite BCD linking there)

api.MediaKeyStatusMap.get.comment: Part of Encrypted Media Extensions, which is hard to write a quick test for

api.MediaTrackSettings.comment: Works, but the amount of settings returned are different between browsers. On desktop MacOS 12.4 the settings returned for my microphone are 4 in Safari 15.5, 6 in Firefox 101 and 8 in Chrome 102. deviceId and echoCancellation being the only two settings included in all three.
